name: FrogMarsh
description:
Meet Luc. All of his friends have been turned into  frogs by the witches of the swamp. It is his mission to make it out of the swamp alive. Luckily he is armed so he can  kill enemies  and witches  and he can use his frog friends to regenerate his health. He will need to find   cherries in order to get through the gates of the level and  find left over witch potions to throw at enemies as well.   He must also over come the obstacles of the swamp such as spike traps and the dangers of falling.

A uniquely stylised 2D adventure that is fun for all ages.

Please leave comments  for how I can improve :)
